question: Which Bollywood actor was recently named in the WEFâ€™s Young Global Leaders (YGLs) list?
explanation:
Bollywood actor Deepika Padukone along with several Indian citizens and India-origin persons joined the list of the Young Global Leaders (YGLs) compiled by the World Economic Forum.
The WEF announced the world's most promising 112 tomorrow's leaders under the age of 40, who are involved in activities including campaigning for public healthcare among others.
